channel.title: Dragon plate wont drop on death when skulled
channel.description: When u die on my server with dragon plate body u lose everything but dplate... u just keep wearing it please help

item.title: Dragon plate wont drop on death when skulled
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

it’s in client.java.

Search for Public void youdied()

public void youdied() { if(playerHasItem(5509)){ deleteItem(5509, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5510)){ deleteItem(5510, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5512)){ deleteItem(5512, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5514)){ deleteItem(5514, 1); } if(playerHasItem(6570)){ keep6570 = true; deleteItem(6570, 1); }

See this?

if(playerHasItem(6570)){ keep6570 = true; deleteItem(6570, 1);

it says keep6570, so it keeps firecape. try seeing if the ID Number of your Dragon platebody is there, and remove the keep statement.

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon plate wont drop on death when skulled

item.title: Dragon plate wont drop on death when skulled
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Thats called: keeping an item when you die. lol. nah, you just have to go into client.java and look for ApplyDead. It should list something there about how many items are kept/lost
